sn45.20:4.3: Katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso, brahmacariyaṃ, katamo brahmacārī, katamaṃ brahmacariyapariyosānan”ti?
sn45.20:4.5: Bhaddako kho te, āvuso bhadda, ummaṅgo, bhaddakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
sn45.20:4.8: Katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso, brahmacariyaṃ, katamo brahmacārī, katamaṃ brahmacariyapariyosānan’”ti?
sn45.20:4.10: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo brahmacariyaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
sn45.20:4.13: Yo kho, āvuso, iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato—
sn45.20:4.15: Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
